p: An interaction of Hmix Ã— Zn was identified for GPx activity in the liver ( p = 0.004), duodenal mucosa ( p < 0.001) and blood ( p = 0.020), and increased GPx activity was found in lambs fed diets with Hmix or Zn alone as compared to those receiving the CON diet or the Hmix and Zn combination ( Table 2 and Table 4). GPx activity in the kidney, jejunal and ileal mucosa was not affected by the treatment.
